publisher.value: HL7 International - Public Health Work Group

name.value: HL7 International - Public Health

description.value:
The purpose of this project is to create an HL7 Fast Healthcare Interoperability Resources (FHIR) Library standard to support the needs of multiple Vital Records Implementation Guides.
This guide is a FHIR Resources (FHIR) Library to support the needs of multiple Vital Records Implementation Guides. It does not provide any use case or scenario specific content or additional guidance on how to use these artifacts, but serves as a source for a standard set of profiles for reuse in multiple use case specific implementation guides focusing on the exchange of Vital Records information. Implementation details such as how and when to use a given artifact will be supplied in these guides.
### Background After evaluation and analysis of two separate FHIR IG projects - [Birth Defects Reporting](https://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/fhir-birthdefectsreporting-ig/) and [Birth and Fetal Death Reporting](http://hl7.org/fhir/us/bfdr/), it was determined that there are many common data elements between the two IGs. The short-term scope of this common profiles library will include data elements common to the above-mentioned FHIR IGs and will define a US Realm specific framework that defines common elements for the implementation guides. The longer-term scope of this profiles library will include analysis and possible inclusion of data elements from other Vital Records projects (such as [Vital Records Mortality and Morbidity Reporting FHIR IG](http://hl7.org/fhir/us/vrdr/)).
To avoid defining the same profiles multiple times, this IG contains a US Realm focused profile library for use by Vital Records and other FHIR standards development efforts to define the appropriate FHIR profiles, value sets, etc., once and allow them to be referenced by each of the specific implementation guides. This profile library will provide a standard framework for inclusion in multiple use case specific implementation guides focused on the exchange of Vital Records information to support interoperability among public health systems and reduce provider and implementer burden. This FHIR implementation guide uses the US Core profiles. Where this FHIR implementation guide is unable to use a US Core profile, we have followed the Cross-Group Projects Work Group's variance request process and have provided the US Realm Steering Committee an approved rationale for deviation in the implementation guide.
For Clinical Safety Information please refer to the [FHIR Implementer’s Safety Checklist](http://hl7.org/fhir/safety.html).
### How to Read This Guide
This Guide is divided into several pages which are listed at the top of each page in the menu bar.
* Home: The home page provides the introduction and background for HL7 FHIR® Vital Records Common Profiles Library. * Terminology: This page provides a listing of the value sets used in this guide. * Downloads: This page provides links to downloadable artifacts. * Artifact Index: This page provides a list of the FHIR artifacts (profiles, examples, and value sets) defined as part of this guide.

name.value: Pregnancy Risk Factor Profiles
Profiles for Death Reporting

description.value: References US SNOMED CT version.

display.value: Extension - Date Part Absent Reason Vital Records

name.value: Extension - Date Part Absent Reason Vital Records

description.value: Provides a reason why an expected date part is missing.

display.value: Extension - RelatedPerson Birth Place Vital Records

name.value: Extension - RelatedPerson Birth Place Vital Records

description.value: The registered place of birth for the related person. A system may use the address.text if it doesn't store the birthPlace address in discrete elements.

name.value: Extension - RelatedPerson Deceased Vital Records

description.value: The deceased indicator for a RelatedPerson. Deceased date/time is preferred.

display.value: Extension - Within City Limits Indicator Vital Records

name.value: Extension - Within City Limits Indicator Vital Records

description.value: Used to indicate whether or not an address is within city limits. The content of the component shall be a value from the value set Yes No Unknown.

description.value: Example of Observation-apgar-score-vr profile (Babyg Quinn: 5 min)

name.value: Observation - APGAR Score Vital Records

description.value: APGAR score post-birth.

name.value: Observation - Birth Weight Vital Records

description.value: The weight of the infant/fetus at birth/delivery.

description.value: Example of Observation-gestational-age-at-delivery profile-vr (Fetus Not Named)

display.value: Observation - Gestational Age at Delivery Vital Records

name.value: Observation - Gestational Age at Delivery Vital Records

description.value: The obstetric estimate of the infant’s gestation in completed weeks based on the birth/delivery attendant’s final estimate of gestation which should be determined by all perinatal factors and assessments such as ultrasound, but not the neonatal exam.

name.value: Observation - Infant Living example [Baby G Quinn]

description.value: Example of Observation-infant-living profile-vr (Baby G Quinn)

name.value: Observation - Infant Living Vital Records

description.value: An indication of whether the infant is living at the time the report is being submitted.

name.value: Observation - Last Menstrual Period example [Carmen Teresa Lee]

description.value: Example of Observation-last-menstrual-period-vr profile (Carmen Teresa Lee)

display.value: Observation - Last Menstrual Period Vital Records

name.value: Observation - Last Menstrual Period Vital Records

description.value: This profile represents the date of the last menstrual period of the patient. The first day of last menstrual period should be captured. The effectiveTime captures the observation date.

description.value: Example of Observation-mother-delivery-weight-vr profile (Jada Ann Quinn)

name.value: Observation - Mother Delivery Weight Vital Records

description.value: The weight of the mother at the time of birth/delivery.

description.value: Example of Observation-mother-height-vr profile (Carmen Teresa Lee)

name.value: Observation - Mother Height Vital Records

description.value: The height of the mother.

description.value: Example of Observation-mother-prepregnancy-weight-vr profile (Carmen Teresa Lee)

display.value: Observation - Mother Prepregnancy Weight Vital Records

name.value: Observation - Mother Prepregnancy Weight Vital Records

description.value: The weight of the mother before becoming pregnant.

description.value: Example of Observation-number-births-now-dead-vr (Carmen Teresa Lee)

description.value: Example of Observation-number-live-births-this-delivery-vr (Carmen Teresa Lee)

display.value: Observation - Number of Births Now Dead Vital Records

name.value: Observation - Number of Births Now Dead Vital Records

description.value: The total number of previous live-born infants for the mother now dead.

description.value: Example of Observation-number-births-now-living-vr profile (Carmen Teresa Lee)

display.value: Observation - Number of Births Now Living Vital Records

name.value: Observation - Number of Births Now Living Vital Records

description.value: The total number of previous live-born infants for the mother now living.

description.value: Example of Observation-number-fetal-deaths-this-delivery profile (Carmen Teresa Lee)

display.value: Observation - Number of Fetal Deaths This Delivery Vital Records

name.value: Observation - Number of Fetal Deaths This Delivery Vital Records

description.value: The number of fetal deaths in this delivery.

display.value: Observation - Number of Live Births This Delivery Vital Records

name.value: Observation - Number of Live Births This Delivery Vital Records

description.value: The number of live births in this delivery.

display.value: Observation - Number of Other Pregnancy Outcomes Vital Records

name.value: Observation - Number of Other Pregnancy Outcomes Vital Records

description.value: The total number of other pregnancy outcomes for the mother that did not result in a live birth (included pregnancy losses of any gestational age, e.g., spontaneous or induced losses or ectopic pregnancies).

display.value: Observation - Number of Prenatal Visits Vital Records

name.value: Observation - Number of Prenatal Visits Vital Records

description.value: The total number of prenatal visits for the mother. The dates of the first and last prenatal visit are indicated by the effective date range. If the mother received no prenatal care, the value should indicate 0 visits.

display.value: Observation - Number of Previous Cesareans Vital Records

name.value: Observation - Number of Previous Cesareans Vital Records

description.value: The total number of prior cesarean deliveries for the mother.

name.value: Observation - Number Other Pregnancy Outcomes example [Jada Ann Quinn]

description.value: Example of Observation-number-other-pregnancy-outcomes-vr (Jada Ann Quinn)

name.value: Observation - Number Prenatal Visits example [Jada Ann Quinn]

description.value: Example of Observation-number-prenatal-visits-vr profile (BabyG Quinn/Jada Ann Quinn)

name.value: Observation - Number Previous Cesareans example [Carmen Teresa Lee]

description.value: Example of Observation-number-previous-cesareans-vr profile (Carmen Teresa Lee)

name.value: Observation - Parent Education Level example [Carmen Teresa Lee]

description.value: Example of Observation-parent-education-level-vr profile (Carmen Teresa Lee)

display.value: Observation - Parent Education Level Vital Records

name.value: Observation - Parent Education Level Vital Records

description.value: The highest degree or level of schooling completed by the parent.

name.value: Observation - Plurality example [Carmen Teresa Lee]

description.value: Example of Observation-plurality-vr profile (Carmen Teresa Lee)

name.value: Observation - Plurality Vital Records

description.value: The number of fetuses delivered live or dead at any time in the pregnancy regardless of gestational age, or if the fetuses were delivered at different dates in the pregnancy. ('Reabsorbed' fetuses, those which are not 'delivered' (expulsed or extracted from the mother) should not be counted.) Include all live births and fetal losses resulting from this pregnancy.

name.value: Observation - Pregnancy Risk Factor example [Carmen Teresa Lee: Hypertensive disorder, systemic arterial]

description.value: Example of Observation-pregnancy-risk-factor-vr profile (Carmen Teresa Lee: Hypertensive disorder, systemic arterial)

display.value: Observation - Pregnancy Risk Factor Vital Records

name.value: Observation - Pregnancy Risk Factor Vital Records

description.value: Selected medical risk factors of the mother during the pregnancy.

name.value: Observation - Race example [Jada Ann Quinn]

description.value: Example of Observation-race-vr profile (Jada Ann Quinn)

name.value: Observation - Race Vital Records

description.value: This profile represents a single race code assigned to the person. If the value is unknown, set dataAbsentReason to "unknown".

name.value: Observation - Tabulated Ethnicity example [Jada Ann Quinn]

description.value: Example of Observation-tabulated-ethnicity-vr example (Jada Ann Quinn)

name.value: Observation - Tabulated Ethnicity Vital Records

description.value: This profile records a code representing the ethnic affiliation information for the mother or father. The observation will convey, as coded data, information that is provided in text form. If the value is unknown, set dataAbsentReason to "unknown".

name.value: Patient - Child example [Baby G Quinn]

description.value: Example of Patient-child-vr profile (Baby G Quinn)

name.value: Patient - Child Vital Records

description.value: The subject patient (newborn/infant/child) for whom clinical data is included in the report.

name.value: Patient - Decedent Fetus example [Fetus Not Named]

description.value: Example of Patient-decedent-fetus-vr (Fetus Not Named)

name.value: Patient - Decedent Fetus Vital Records

description.value: A stillborn for whom clinical data is included in the report.

name.value: Patient - Mother Date Part Absent

description.value: Example of Patient-mother-vr profile (Date Part Absent)

name.value: Patient - Mother example [Carmen Teresa Lee]

description.value: Example of Patient-mother-vr profile (Carmen Teresa Lee)

name.value: Patient - Mother Jada Ann Quinn

description.value: Example of Patient-mother-vr profile (Jada Ann Quinn)

name.value: Patient - Mother Vital Records

description.value: This Patient profile represents the woman who gave birth to, or delivered the infant.

name.value: Practitioner - Vital Records example [Janet Seito]

description.value: Example of Practitioner-vital-records-vr profile (Janet Seito)

name.value: Practitioner - Vital Records

description.value: This Practitioner profile represents a practitioner who is involved in vital records (births, fetal death, death, etc.) as a certifier or an attendant. This profile is based on the US Core Practitioner and adds a further constraint to capture the title of the practitioner.

name.value: Related Person - Parent Vital Records

description.value: The RelatedPerson profile contains constraints common to the Mother and Father profiles.

name.value: RelatedPerson - Adoptive Father

description.value: Example of RelatedPerson-father-vr profile (adoptive father)

name.value: RelatedPerson - Adoptive Mother

description.value: Example of RelatedPerson-mother-vr profile (adoptive mother)

name.value: RelatedPerson - Father example [Tom Yan Lee]

description.value: Example of Relatedperson-father-vr (Tom Yan Lee)

name.value: RelatedPerson - Father Natural example [Tom Yan Lee]

description.value: Example of Relatedperson-father-natural-vr (Tom Yan Lee)

name.value: RelatedPerson - Father Natural Vital Records

description.value: The biological (natural) father of the newborn or fetus.

name.value: RelatedPerson - Father Vital Records

description.value: The father of the subject. Different individuals may play different roles as the father (e.g., biological father, adoptive father, etc.).

name.value: RelatedPerson - Mother Gestaional example [Carmen Teresa Lee]

description.value: Example of Relatedperson-gestational-vr profile (Carmen Teresa Lee)

name.value: RelatedPerson - Mother Gestational Vital Records

description.value: The woman who gave birth to or delivered the infant. The RelatedPerson structure is required in order to link the mother to the newborn or fetus.

name.value: RelatedPerson - Mother Vital Records

description.value: The mother of the report subject. Different individuals may play different roles as the mother (e.g., biological mother, adoptive mother, etc.).

name.value: RelatedPerson - Stepmother

description.value: Example of RelatedPerson-parent-vr profile (stepmother)

name.value: ValueSet - APGAR Score Timing Vital Records

description.value: This value set contains codes to represent standard timings for APGAR assessments.

name.value: ValueSet - Date Part Vital Records

description.value: This value set contains codes that represent the parts of a date

name.value: ValueSet - Education Level Person Vital Records

description.value: This value set contains codes that represent persons for whom education level can be reported.

name.value: ValueSet - Father Relationship Vital Records

description.value: This value set contains codes that represent relationships describing the father's role relative to the subject.

name.value: ValueSet - Mother Relationship Vital Records

description.value: This value set contains codes that represent relationships describing the mother's role relative to the subject.

display.value: Observation - Cause of Death Part 1 Vital Records

name.value: Observation - Cause of Death Part 1 Vital Records

description.value: The Observation - Cause of Death Part 1 profile reflects the ordered causes of death asserted by the death certifier. The cause of death is initially specified with text.

display.value: Observation - Contributing Cause of Death Part 2 Vital Records

name.value: Observation - Contributing Cause of Death Part 2 Vital Records

description.value: The Observation - Contributing Cause of Death Part 2 profile is used to identify factors contributing to the cause of death as asserted by the death certifier.

name.value: Observation - Death Date Vital Records

description.value: This Observation provides the death date, death pronouncer, and date pronounced dead. If the actual date of death is known, set value to type dateTime. If the date of death is not known, and a range is known, set value to type Period.

name.value: Observation - Injury Incident Vital Records

description.value: This Observation provides the certified explanation of how the injury leading to death occurred.

display.value: Observation - Autopsy Performed Indicator Vital Records

name.value: Observation - Autopsy Performed Indicator Vital Records

description.value: This Observation records if an autopsy was performed, if autopsy findings are available, and the autopsy Performer (US Core Practioner).

display.value: CodeSystem - Death Pregnancy Status Vital Records

name.value: CodeSystem - Death Pregnancy Status Vital Records

description.value: Codes that reflect whether the decedent was pregnant at or around the time of death. Includes the concepts defined in [Pregnancy Status (NCHS)[2.16.840.1.114222.4.11.6003]](https://phinvads.cdc.gov/vads/ViewValueSet.action?oid=2.16.840.1.114222.4.11.6003) which are from the [PHIN VS (CDC Local Coding System)[2.16.840.1.114222.4.5.274]](https://phinvads.cdc.gov/vads/ViewCodeSystem.action?id=2.16.840.1.114222.4.5.274)

display.value: CodeSystem - Local Components Codes Vital Records

name.value: CodeSystem - Local Components Codes Vital Records

description.value: Local Component Codes for observation components that lack an appropriate LOINC code.

display.value: Observation - Manner of Death Vital Records

name.value: Observation - Manner of Death Vital Records

description.value: This Observation provides the conclusion arrived at upon completion of death investigation regarding the manner of death (e.g., natural, homicide, suicide, accident).

name.value: Observation - Decedent Pregnancy Vital Records

description.value: This Observation provides an indication of the pregnancy status of the decedent.

display.value: Observation - Tobacco Use Contributed to Death Vital Records

name.value: Observation - Tobacco Use Contributed to Death Vital Records

description.value: This Observation provides the conclusion arrived at during death investigation regarding the extent to which tobacco use contributed to the death of the decedent.

name.value: Procedure - Death Certification Vital Records

description.value: This Procedure records the certification of death by the certifier.

name.value: Location - Injury Vital Records

description.value: This Location records the location of an injury. It is based on US Core Location and further constrains the type element to indicate that this is the location of an injury.

name.value: Extension - Date Time Vital Records

description.value: The time portion (DD) of the partial date.

display.value: ValueSet - Date Establishment Approach Vital Records

name.value: ValueSet - Date Establishment Approach Vital Records

description.value: This value set contains codes that describe the approach to establishing a date.

display.value: ValueSet - Death Pregnancy Status Vital Records

name.value: ValueSet - Death Pregnancy Status Vital Records

description.value: A set of codes that reflect whether the decedent was pregnant at or around the time of death. Based on [Pregnancy Status (NCHS)[2.16.840.1.114222.4.11.6003]](https://phinvads.cdc.gov/vads/ViewValueSet.action?oid=2.16.840.1.114222.4.11.6003).

display.value: ValueSet - Manner of Death Vital Records

name.value: ValueSet - Manner of Death Vital Records

description.value: A set of codes to reflect the manner that a person died.

name.value: Extension - Date Day Vital Records

description.value: The day portion (DD) of the partial date.

name.value: Extension - Date Month Vital Records

description.value: The month portion (MM) of the partial date.

display.value: Extension - Date Year Vital Records Vital Records

name.value: Extension - Date Year Vital Records

description.value: The year portion (YYYY) of the partial date.

display.value: ValueSet - Place of Death Vital Records

name.value: ValueSet - Place of Death Vital Records

description.value: Code values reflecting the death location of the decedent (e.g., hospital, home, hospice).

display.value: ValueSet - Transportation Incident Role Vital Records

name.value: ValueSet - Transportation Incident Role Vital Records

description.value: Role of the decedent in a transportation incident resulting in a death-related injury.

name.value: Location - Death Vital Records

description.value: This Location records the location of death. It is based on US Core Location and further constrains the type element to indicate that this is the location of death.

name.value: Extension - Partial DateTime Vital Records

description.value: Provides values of a partial dateTime

display.value: ValueSet - Units of Age Vital Records

name.value: ValueSet - Units of Age Vital Records

description.value: A set of codes for specifying the units used when recording age (days, years, etc.).

display.value: ValueSet - Yes, No, Not Applicable Vital Records

name.value: ValueSet - Yes, No, Not Applicable Vital Records

description.value: A set of codes used to respond to any question that can be answered Yes, No, or Not Applicable. Based on [Yes No Not Applicable (NCHS)[2.16.840.1.114222.4.11.7486]](https://phinvads.cdc.gov/vads/ViewValueSet.action?oid=2.16.840.1.114222.4.11.7486)

display.value: ValueSet - Yes No Unknown NotApplicable Vital Records

name.value: ValueSet - Yes No Unknown NotApplicable Vital Records

description.value: Valueset with Yes, No, Unknown, and Not Applicable.

display.value: ValueSet - Yes No Unknown Vital Records

name.value: ValueSet - Yes No Unknown Vital Records

description.value: Value set with Yes, No and Unknown.

CodeSystem - MDI

description.value: This code system contains codes for use in death investigations and reporting.

name.value: CodeSystem - MDI

description.value: This code system contains codes for use in death investigations and reporting.

name.value: ValueSet - Certifier Types Vital Records

description.value: A set of codes indicating the type of certifier (Medical Examiner/Coroner, Certifying physician, etc.) The MDI ValueSet - Certifier Types artifact overlaps with the VRDR Certifier Types VS artifact.

name.value: Observation - Previous Preterm Birth Vital Records

description.value: This Observation profile indicates that the mother had a pregnancy risk factor of previous preterm birth.

name.value: Condition - Gestational Diabetes Vital Records

description.value: This Condition profile indicates that the mother had a pregnancy risk factor of gestational diabetes.

name.value: Condition - Prepregnancy Diabetes Vital Records

description.value: This Condition profile indicates that the mother had a pregnancy risk factor of prepregnancy diabetes.

name.value: Condition - Eclampsia Hypertension Vital Records

description.value: This Condition profile indicates that the mother had a pregnancy risk factor of eclampsia hypertension.

name.value: Condition - Prepregnancy HypertensionVitalRecords

description.value: This Condition profile indicates that the mother had a pregnancy risk factor of prepregnancy hypertension.

name.value: Condition - Gestational Hypertension Vital Records

description.value: This Condition profile indicates that the mother had a pregnancy risk factor of gestational hypertension.

name.value: Observation - Previous Cesarean Vital Records

description.value: This profile indicates that the mother had a pregnancy risk factor of previous cesarean.

display.value: Observation - None Of Specified Pregnancy Risk Factors Vital Records

name.value: Observation - None Of Specified Pregnancy Risk Factors Vital Records

description.value: This profile indicates that none of the specified pregnancy risk factors (including concept codes: 73211009, 11687002, 8762007, 48194001, 15938005, 161765003, 271903000, 63487001, 58533008, 63487001, 200144004) were risks factors noted for this pregnancy.
